Hoboken.Rattlestick Playwrights Theater:
Rattlestick Playwrights Theater is a non-profit off-Broadway theater based in the West Village, New York.


== History ==
Founded in 1994, the company is currently housed in a 104-seat venue at 224 Waverly Place in the West Village. Beginning with Jesse Eisenberg's Asuncion in its 17th Season, Rattlestick also began producing a portion of each of its seasons at the Cherry Lane Theatre.
